name: Bali Shopping & Shipping Tours
description: SHOPPING IN BALI MADE SIMPLY…......DECORATE YOUR HOME AND GARDEN FOR HALF THE PRICE OF RETAIL HERE IN AUSTRALIA….FOR THE DIY SHOPPER OR THE NOVICE WE CAN MAKE EASY FOR YOU. FOR THE DIY, ONCE YOU HAVE COMPLETED YOUR SHOPPING, JUST CONTACT US AND WE WILL TAKE OVER THE COLLECTION AND SHIPMENT OF GOODS. FOR THE NOVICE , I CAN ORGAINSE DAY TRIP, WHICH WILL INCLUDE ENGLISH SPEAKING DRIVER AND CAR. OUR DRIVER WILL HELP TRANSLATE IF REQUIRED. YOUR GOODS WILL BE CLEARED BY US THROUGH CUSTOMS, SO NO NEED SPENDING HOURS AT THE WHARF. CONTAINER WILL BE LANDED AT OUR CARINGBAH WAREHOUSE FOR YOUR COLLECTION. FOR PEOPLE LIVING IN OTHER STATES, WE CAN DELIVER CONTAINER TO SPECIFIED LOCATION OR NEAREST PORT. FOR BUSINESS CLIENTS WE CAN ASSIST AS WELL FOR MORE INFORMATION PLEASE CONTACT CHRISTINE 0449 875 662 OR DAVID 0416 111 949. BALI CONTACT KETUT++62 81 797 54005 YANTI ++62 81 859 3521 3078

name: Bali Shopping & Shipping Tours 2
description:
BEAUTIFUL WATERFEATURES FOR THE GARDEN. HANDCARVED LIMESTONE AND GREENSTONE (LAVA STONE) TO CEMENT MOULDS. HAVE DESIGNED TO YOUR SPECIFICATIONS. AFTER SHOPPING IN BALI FOR MANY YEARS FOR BUSINESS, I HAVE VERY TALENTED RELIABLE SUPPLIERS THAT MY STAFF CAN TAKE YOU TO, OR WE CAN SHOW THE MAIN AREA WHERE YOU CAN SPEND HOURS JUST LOOKING
  • TIP.. BEFORE YOU LEAVE FOR YOUR HOLDIAY GO ONTO INTERNET AND TRY AND FIND SIMILAR STYLE AND MATERIAL THAT YOU WOULD LIKE….HOME INMPROVEMENT MAGAZINES ARE A GREAT RESOURCE.
  • BE CREATIVE, IF YOU HAVE A CONCEPT THAT YOU MAY THINK CANT BE DONE, IT PROBABLY CAN. THE BALINESE ARE THE MOST CREATIVE PEOPLE I HAVE COME TO KNOW..ON MY LAST TRIP I SAW SOME INCREDABLE OUTDOOR CEMENT SHOWERS THAT A TOURIST THOUGHT, ILL SEE IF THIS IS POSSIBLE!
TIP..BE VERY ACCURATE WITH YOUR MEASUREMENTS..WE WILL DO OUR BEST TO CHECK, BUT IT IS THE CLIENTS RESPONSIBLILITY TO MAKE SURE THEY ARE CORRECT.

name: Bali Shopping & Shipping Tours 3
description: FURNITURE..TEAK, RATTAN, ALUMINIUM, WROUGHT IRON, AND OUTDOOR PLACTIC RATTAN. FOR THE NOVICE THIS CAN BE VERY DAUNTING AND HIGHLY PRESSURED VENTURE. WHAT COULD TAKE YOU WEEKS TO FIND WE CAN MINIMISE TO A DAY OR TWO. BY TAKING YOU TO RELIABLE AND TALENTED SUPPLIERS, OR TO THE AREAS WHERE THEY ARE CRAFTED. BALI IS THE LAND OF VERY CREATVIE AND GIFTED CRAFTSMAN, WHICH IS REFLECTED IN THIER TEAK HAND CRAFTED FURNITURE, BEAUTIFUL DAY BEDS, SOLID WOODEN TABLES AND CHAIRS. IT IS ALSO A TROPICAL CLIMATE WITH VERY HIGH HUMIDITY. THIS IS WHY IT IS VERY IMPORTANT TO USE SUPPLIERS WHO’S WOOD HAS BEEN DRIED IN A KILN. TO ERADICATE MOULD AND CRACKING WOOD SHOULD NOT BE MORE THAN 12% MOISTURE. WE HAVE A MOISTURE METRE WHICH WE CAN TEST THIS. (WE STILL TO NOT TAKE RESPONSIBILY FOR CRACK ONCE BACK HOME). TIP..UNLESS WOOD IS KEPT OILD, IT WILL FADE AND POSSIBLY CRACK..TOO MANY TIMES HERE I HEAR SALESMAN TELLING CUSTOMERS THAT SETTINGS (ESPECIALLY SLATT TABLE AND CHAIRS) CAN STAY OUTSIDE NO WORRIES, NEXT SEASON THROUGH AWAY’S HOMEWARES AND SOFT FURNISHING. THERE ARE MANY INTERIOR DESIGN SHOPS AROUND BALI. BALI IS A GREAT STARTING POINT FOR YOUNG DESIGNERS. NOT ALL ARE IN THEY TRENDY AREA OF SEMINYAK AND LEGIAN, WE CAN TAKE YOU TO OTHER REMOTE PLACES AS WELL. BEAUTIFUL FABRICS COMING OUT ALL THE TIME….......GOURGEOUS. I HOPE I HAVE GOT YOU THINKING OF YOUR NEXT TRIP TO BALI AND SEEING A DIFFERENT SIDE… PEASE DO NOT HESITATE IN CALLING ME OR LEAVING A MESSAGE…..HAPPY SHOPPING, CHRISITNE .
